decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):

1920-101793-001 P1 - Location plan, 1920-101793-002 P1 - Site layout plan, 1920-101793-003 P1 - Existing elevations Block 1, 1920-101793-004 P1 - Existing elevations Block 2, 1920-101793-005 P1 - Existing elevations Block 3, 1920-101793-006 P1 - Existing elevations Block 4, 1920-101793-007 P1 - Existing elevations Block 5, 1920-101793-008 P1 - Existing elevations Block 6, 1920-101793-009 P1 - Existing elevations Block 7, 1920-101793-010 P1 - Existing elevations Block 8, 1920-101793-011 P1 - Existing door sheet 1 of 4, 1920-101793-012 P1 - Existing doors sheet 2 of 4, 1920-101793-013 P1 - Existing doors sheet 3 of 4, 1920-101793-014 P1 - Existing door sheet 4 of 4, 1920-101793-015 P2 - Proposed elevations Block 1, 1920-101793-016 P2 - Proposed elevations Block 2,  1920-101793-017 P2 - Proposed elevations Block 3, 1920-101793-018 P2 - Proposed elevations Block 4, 1920-101793-019 P2 - Proposed elevations Block 5, 1920-101793-020 P2 - Proposed elevations Block 6, 1920-101793-021 P2 - Proposed elevations Block 7, 1920-101793-022 P2 - Proposed elevations Block 8, 1920-101793-023 P2 - Proposed door sheet 1 of 4, 1920-101793-024 P2 - Proposed door sheet 2 of 4, 1920-101793-025 P2 - Proposed door sheet 3 of 4, 1920-101793-026 P2 - Proposed door sheet 4 of 4, Q200047/1/1B - Door detail, Q200047/2/1B - Door detail
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be as shown on the approved plans and as shown in the email received on 17/06/2020.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2018).
